parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The ID for the tenant or account in a multi-tenancy cloud.

get.description: Lists load balancers that are configured for the account.

post.description: Creates a load balancer with the configuration defined by the request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: One to ten load balancer IDs. For example: `?id={loadBalancerId}`. The default limit is ten IDs per request.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The ID for the tenant or account in a multi-tenancy cloud.

get.description: Lists allowed domains.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The ID for the tenant or account in a multi-tenancy cloud.

get.description: Lists supported load balancing protocols.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The ID for the tenant or account in a multi-tenancy cloud.

get.description: Lists all supported load balancing algorithms.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The ID for the tenant or account in a multi-tenancy cloud.

get.description: Lists billable load balancers for a specified date range.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: If the startTime parameter is supplied but the endTime parameter is not, all usage beginning with the startTime is returned.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: If the endTime parameter is supplied but the startTime parameter is not, all usage up to the endTime is returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The pagination offset.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The pagination limit. The response is paginated with a default limit of 500 and a maximum limit of 1000.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The ID for the tenant or account in a multi-tenancy cloud.

parameters.name: loadBalancerId
parameters.description: The ID for the load balancer.

get.description: Shows details for a specified load balancer.

put.description: Updates the properties for a specified load balancer.

delete.description: Deletes a load balancer from the account.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The ID for the tenant or account in a multi-tenancy cloud.

parameters.name: loadBalancerId
parameters.description: The ID for the load balancer.

get.description: Shows statistics for a specified load balancer.

parameters.description: The ID for the tenant or account in a multi-tenancy cloud.

parameters.name: loadBalancerId
parameters.description: The ID for the load balancer.

get.description: Shows the custom error page that is configured for a specified load balancer.

put.description: Sets a custom error page for a specified load balancer.

delete.description: Deletes the custom error page for a specified load balancer.

parameters.description: The ID for the tenant or account in a multi-tenancy cloud.

parameters.name: loadBalancerId
parameters.description: The ID for the load balancer.

get.description: Lists nodes that are configured for a specified load balancer.

post.description: Adds a node to a specified load balancer.

delete.description: Bulk-deletes the specified nodes from a specified load balancer.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: The ID for the specified node.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The ID for the tenant or account in a multi-tenancy cloud.

parameters.name: loadBalancerId
parameters.description: The ID for the load balancer.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: The ID for the node.

get.description: Show details for a specified node.

put.description: Updates the configuration for a specified node on a specified load balancer.

delete.description: Deletes a node from a specified load balancer.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The ID for the tenant or account in a multi-tenancy cloud.

parameters.name: loadBalancerId
parameters.description: The ID for the load balancer.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: The ID for the node.

get.description: Shows all metadata associated with a specified node and load balancer.

post.summary: Add load balancer node metadata item
post.description: Adds a metadata item to a specified node and load balancer.

delete.summary: Bulk-delete load balancer node metadata items
delete.description: Bulk-deletes the metadata items given specified id list.

parameters.name: metaId
parameters.description: The ID for the metadata item.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The ID for the tenant or account in a multi-tenancy cloud.

parameters.name: loadBalancerId
parameters.description: The ID for the load balancer.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: The ID for the node.

parameters.name: metaId
parameters.description: The ID of the metadata item.

get.summary: Show load balancer node metadata item
get.description: Shows details for a specified metadata item for a specified node and load balancer.

put.summary: Update load balancer node metadata item
put.description: Updates the configuration of a metadata item on the node.

delete.summary: Delete load balancer node metadata item
delete.description: Deletes a metadata item from the node.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The ID for the tenant or account in a multi-tenancy cloud.

parameters.name: loadBalancerId
parameters.description: The ID for the load balancer.

get.description: Lists node service events.

examples.application/json:
{
    "nodeServiceEvents": [
        {
            "category": "UPDATE",
            "description": "Node '373' status changed to 'ONLINE' for load balancer '323'",
            "title": "Node Status Updated",
            "detailedMessage": "Node is ok",
            "author": "Rackspace Cloud",
            "nodeId": 373,
            "relativeUri": "/406271/loadbalancers/323/nodes/373/events",
            "created": "10-30-2012 10:18:23",
            "loadbalancerId": 323,
            "accountId": 406271,
            "type": "UPDATE_NODE",
            "id": 7,
            "severity": "INFO"
        },
        {
            "category": "UPDATE",
            "description": "Node '373' status changed to 'OFFLINE' for load balancer '323'",
            "title": "Node Status Updated",
            "detailedMessage": "Invalid HTTP response received; premature end of headers",
            "author": "Rackspace Cloud",
            "nodeId": 373,
            "relativeUri": "/406271/loadbalancers/323/nodes/373/events",
            "created": "10-30-2012 11:22:25",
            "loadbalancerId": 323,
            "accountId": 406271,
            "type": "UPDATE_NODE",
            "id": 8,
            "severity": "INFO"
        }
    ]
}
